subject: Colleges and Universities
Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. sued the governor of Pennsylvania over a new law designed to ensure that a $60 million fine paid by Penn State over the Jerry Sandusky child molesting scandal remains in the state.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. sued the governor of Pennsylvania over a new law designed to ensure that a $60 million fine paid by Penn State over the Jerry Sandusky child molesting scandal remains in the state.
